mapper.select: SELECT m.memberIdx, membership, m1.userId, userName, userPwd, enabled, register_date, modify_date, last_login, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, email, tel, zip, addr1, addr2 FROM member m JOIN member1 m1 ON m.memberIdx = m1.memberIdx LEFT OUTER JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.userId = m2.userId WHERE m1.userId = #{userId}
